fulltext:
TRƯƠNG BỈNH HỒ (LUKE TRUONG) 
ABOUT ME
Experienced Operations Manager with a demonstrated history of building up process and procedure 
to streamline daily operations, increase the productivity of the business. Skillful in Project 
management, negotiation, business planning and Sales management. Solid foundation of 
Commerce & Marketing from RMIT University. 
0859 124 313 
truongbinhho@gmail.com 
EXPERIENCE
OPERATIONS & PROJECTS MANAGER | TPF SPORTS (AUS) 
NOV 2017 TO PRESENT – VN OFFICE 
•Formed and managed 4 sub teams: Fulfilment, Motorsport, Warehouse and E-Commerce to serve 2 
strategic Business Units in Melbourne: Membership Fulfilment and Motorsport.
[Operations Management] 
•Developed operation processes driving Vietnam team with other cross functional teams in Hong Kong, 
China and Australia. Ensured high level of services from Viet Nam are delivered. 
•Provided plans, details schedules in Purchasing, Production and KPI for daily operations tasks. 
•Allocated manpower to maximise team capability and efficiency on a cost-effective basis. 
•Ensured Project Critical timeline are met and goods are delivered at the best cost saving. 
•Managed and activated Online/ E-Commerce promotions (discount promotion, Email direct 
Marketing…). Managed E-Commerce Marketing Calendar through-out the year.
•Random spot-checked data accuracy of Sales figures, Backorders value, Purchase order value and
Stock management system. 
•Managed Sales data, product sales through, product forecast and current Stock on hand level to 
provide further decisions in reordering, clearance or product renovation. 
•Ensured all cost allocated into a project were accountable. Reported into team P&L. 
•Coordinated activities that affect operational decisions and Australia team requirements. 
•Performance audited and reviewed China Warehouse at Shenzhen 
•Built, set up and standardised procedures Fulfilment warehouse, capacity at 1 million parcels. 
[Major Projects Management] 
•Guided and provided brief for full Request for Proposals and new project pitching. Some successful
proposals to clubs and Governing bodies: Cricket Australia, Swimming Australia, Basketball Australia, 
AFL association, NRL association, Supercars championship, Red Bull Racing team and Shell-V Power
Racing team. 
•Run market research and client demand on pitching to match up the business capability.
•Reviewed forecasted P&L & Pricing structure. Provide creative commercial business deals and offers.
•Supervised projects with commercial solutions on regarding time-line and production capacity. 
OPERATIONS TEAM LEADER | TPF SPORTS (AUS) 
AUGUST 2015 TO NOV 2017 - VN OFFICE 
•Managed daily operations of 8 staff in 2 teams: Motorsport and Fulfilment. 
•Successful built up Personalised products process. Driven business to purchase from Vietnam. 
•Managed/ procured minor merchandise projects directly with medium footy clubs (such as: Hawthorn, 
Carlton) and developing Racing teams (Holden, Milwaukee and Mobil 1 Mega). 
•Developed Vietnam team in potential risks prevention, especially in production & delivery delay, extra 
handling tasks and future accumulated cost. 
•Central point of contact for cross-countries teams: Sales in Australia, Development in Hong Kong and
Production in China & Vietnam, in small-medium projects.
PROJECT COORDINATOR | TPF THINK (AUS) 
JULY 2014 TO JULY 2015 - VN OFFICE 
•Coordinated with Corporate clients for business merchandises (apparels, give-away, corporate 
welcome packs and warehousing services) by quotation’s submission. 
•Managed client’s offer and suggestions according to budget and requirements.
•Briefed and managed artwork to in-house studio team, ensure the brand guidelines are followed and
not exceed production capability.
•Managed inventory and reorders for 10 redemption programs, in particular, Coca Cola (Coke)
Promotions Warehouse, Samsung, Audi, McGrath Foundation. 
MARKETING ASSISTANT | DUCATI VIETNAM 
JUN 2013 TO JULY 2014  
•Creatively presented Marketing ideas, promotions, initiatives new ideas to approach customer.
•Work closely with major partners such as: Motul, Shell Power, Marlboro and Motor show partner to
create seasonal campaigns, new releases and new products launching. 
•Daily monitored Online and Social articles with Media partner of Tinhte, VnExpress and 24h.com.vn; 
Motorbike forums such as: Autofun, 2banh, BKVN and other groups
•Directly executed launching events for Test ride, new unboxing, new arrival and bike display. 
EDUCATION 
BACHELOR OF COMMERCE MARKETING 
RMIT University  2010 – 2013 
MARKETING FOR MANAGER COURSE 
RMIT University  Distinction 
2013 
INTERMEDIATE PHYSICIAN
Dai Viet University  2018 - present
ACHIEVEMENTS 
VIET NAM REPRESENTATIVE 
KEY CLIENTS MEETING 
Australia - Sep 2015 & May 2016 
Vietnam Sep 2018
SET UP & STANDALISED FULFILMENT 
WAREHOUSE (1 million parcels per year) 
2017-2018
COACHING SKILLS FOR 
AMAZING MENTORS RMIT Viet Nam 
2017 
RMIT LEAD 
STUDENT AMBASSADOR LEADER 
 2011 to 2013 
CHAMPION 
MARKETING CHALLENGERS 2012
2012 – as team leader 
HIGHLIGHTS 
B2B & B2C STRATEGIC PLANNING 
LEADERSHIP
PROCEDURE DEVELOPMENT 
DATA ANALYTICAL 
PROBLEM-SOLVING 
SELF-STARTER 
LANGUAGES 
NATIVE 
VIETNAMESE 
ADVANCED/ FLUENT 
BEGINNER 
ENGLISH  CHINESE
